Rogue Armor

Rogue Armor is the class armor for the Rogue.

Description

Rogue Armor is a special armor obtained by using an Armor Kit on a tier-3 armor (Plate Mail, Scale Armor, or Leather Armor). It grants the wearer special stealth abilities.

Special Ability

Phase Shift: The Rogue can teleport to any visible location on the current level, but will become vertigo'd for 5 turns after doing so.

Stats

  • Armor Class: Based on the base armor used to create it
  • Durability: Standard for class armor
  • Special: Can use Phase Shift ability

Strategy

  • Use Phase Shift to escape dangerous situations
  • Use Phase Shift to get to distant items or areas quickly
  • Be aware of the vertigo debuff after using Phase Shift
  • The teleportation ability can be used strategically for positioning

Technical Details

  • Implementation: RogueArmor.java
  • Base Class: ClassArmor.java

Code References

  • RogueArmor.java
  • ClassArmor.java
  • ArmorKit.java
  • RogueArmor strings
